about_the_game:
Step into the dazzling streets of 1950s Salem, a city of towering lights and whispered spells, where glamour masks danger, and magic simmers beneath the surface of modernity. Dakota, the daughter of a Salem witch, returns to her hometown after receiving a mysterious letter about her mother’s death. Attacked by a shadowy figure, Dakota finds herself mortally wounded and trapped between the world of the living and the spirit realm. Guided by her mother’s friend Sebille, Dakota discovers her magical abilities and learns the killer is hunting witches across Salem. As a ghost, Dakota uncovers dark rituals, confronts vengeful spirits, and pieces together the attacker's identity. With her body lying in a hospital bed, her soul journeys into Salem’s most haunted places. Will Dakota harness her newfound powers, save her coven, and return to the living - or will she be consumed by the shadows?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔮 Spellbinding Mini-Games!

Put your skills to the test with enchanting puzzles that unlock secrets and propel Dakota’s story forward. Tackle creative potion-brewing, memory-based spellcasting sequences, and intricate lock-picking games!

🔮 Immersive Hidden Object Games!

Delve into classic hidden object games as you find hidden objects crucial to unmasking Salem’s lurking terrors. Explore eerie cemeteries, haunted mansions, and neon-lit streets of 1950s Salem, all brimming with supernatural clues!

🔮 Choice-Driven Narrative!

Shape Dakota’s destiny with decisions that lead to multiple endings—will you stand strong or succumb to the dark? Forge alliances or fuel rivalries with characters who hold the key to defeating Salem’s witch-hunter. Every dialogue choice matters!

🔮 Magical Collectibles and Achievements!

Hunt for ancient amulets, spell tomes, and coven artifacts that enhance Dakota’s powers and reveal Salem’s haunted legacy. Earn achievements by solving mini-games flawlessly, uncovering rare items, and making key narrative choices!
